summary: "The Watchers" is a 2024 horror movie about an artist named Mina who gets stuck in a big, untouched forest in Ireland. She finds shelter with three strangers but they're all hunted by strange creatures every night. It's directed by Ishana Night Shyamalan and based on A.M. Shine's novel. The movie was released in June 2024 but didn't do well with critics, and made $33 million worldwide.
title: The Watchers (film)
